name: UIMenuItem
desc: A custom item in the editing menu managed by the menu controller.

items.name: init(title: String, action: Selector)
items.desc: Creates and returns a menu-item object initialized with the given title and action.

items.name: var title: String
items.desc: The title of the menu item.

items.name: var action: Selector
items.desc: A selector identifying the method of the responder object to invoke for handling of the menu command.
